testimonial.text: Since 2018 Rafi has been responsible for the development of our website which has been instrumental to the growth of our company. Even while working remotely he’s been highly responsive, organized and strategic in his thinking. In addition to staying on top of day-to-day site changes and builds, he’s provided us with great advice to stay on top of the current changes in web technologies. He’s also implemented effective project management and Q&A processes. As a result R has been an highly valued and impactful member of our team.
testimonial.author: Mark Greenspan

testimonial.text: Rafi is AMAZING! If you have any doubt about hiring him, ask me – I am really impressed by this guy!
testimonial.author: Wilfried Hajek

testimonial.text: Rafi is one of the best professionals that we have known in web development skills. Between his skills you can find good communication and accuracy with the planning in complex projects.
testimonial.author: Jonathan Castro
